name: BBQ Pulled Chicken Sandwiches
author: Tara Shepard
summary: This is an amazing recipe! There's nothing better than BBQ pulled chicken sandwiches!
ingredients: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 ½ cups barbeque sauce (such as KC Masterpiece® Original)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place chicken into the bottom of a slow cooker and cover with water
Cook on High until it is no longer pink in the center and falls apart when pulled, about 4 hours
Puree onion and garlic in the bowl of a food processor until finely minced
Remove chicken from the slow cooker and shred meat with 2 forks
Return chicken to the slow cooker
Add pureed onion-garlic mixture, barbeque sauce, vinegar, salt, and pepper
Mix well and cook on High until heated through, about 10 minutes
Serve on buns with mozzarella cheese
